relation: IMPORTANT: If you have a blog on JustBento...
pageTitle: Has anyone EVER seen this stuff? | Just Bento Community Forum
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {14672=The question you asked is if anyone had EVER seen this stuff. Yes I have, ナイトメアー ビフォアクリスマス was very popular when I first started visiting Japan in 2002 and 2003 and I saw bento boxes and diaries and lots of other goodies with these characters. But Japan has moved on and less and less merchandising with this theme is available each year. You can still get water bottles and coffee cups and a few other goods with NBC motifs but nothing like before. My suggestion would be a Japanese Disney Store or somewhere like calamel.jp I'll be visiting Tokyo Disney in just over a month and can ask there (the Disney shops there have the widest range of Disney merchandise in Japan)- but I'll be with my father-in-law and have a toddler in tow who may or may not be co-operative so I'm not sure how much time I can dedicate to this. If you know anyone else going to Tokyo Disney this could well be your best option.}
